CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 13, 1952, pg. 1, reads: "Lower Hill Survey Starts - A survey of the 8,000 residents who now live in Lower Hill got under way Monday. Designed to put together information on housing needs, family size and income, the canvass will reach every family in the area within the next six weeks.  Here is a survey worker, Mrs. Katharyne Irvis, interviews the Mason family at 907 Wylie Avenue. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Katharyne Irvis conducting survey of Lower Hill District residents, surrounded by Mr. Mason and his children, in kitchen with grid and fruit patterned tablecloth, in home at 907 Wylie Avenue
